data.title: Avantel Secures ₹13 Crore Contract from DRDO, Strengthening Market Position
data.description: Avantel secures a ₹13 crore contract from DRDO, boosting its market position and operational capacity.

data.title: Zodiac Energy Launches New Solar Power Plant in Gujarat, Boosting Renewable Energy Capacity
data.description: Zodiac Energy has successfully launched a solar power plant in Gujarat with a capacity of 3.003 MWP, marking a significant step in its renewable energy initiatives.

data.title: Brigade Enterprises Unveils ₹2,100 Crore Residential Project in Chennai
data.description: Brigade Enterprises has launched a new residential project in Chennai valued at ₹2,100 crore, signaling strong growth potential in the real estate sector.

data.title: India Cements to Divest Entire Stake in Subsidiary ICML for ₹97.68 Crores
data.description: India Cements plans to divest its entire stake in subsidiary ICML for ₹97.68 crores, aiming to streamline operations amid ongoing financial challenges.

data.title: Zen Technologies Expands Horizons with Tisa Aerospace Acquisition
data.description: Zen Technologies' board has approved the acquisition of a 54.67% stake in Tisa Aerospace for ₹6.56 crore, marking its entry into the UAV sector.

data.title: Interarch Secures ₹80 Crore Order, Strengthening Market Position
data.description: Interarch Building Solutions has secured a significant order worth ₹80 crore, enhancing its market position in high-end metal interior products.

data.title: Bajel Projects Secures ₹4 Billion Order from Powergrid Corporation
data.description: Bajel Projects has secured an ultra-mega order exceeding ₹4 billion from Powergrid Corporation of India, marking a significant milestone for the company.

data.title: Manba Finance Secures ₹2 Billion Fundraising Approval to Fuel Growth
data.description: Manba Finance's board has approved a ₹2 billion fundraising through non-convertible debentures, aiming to bolster its financial position and support growth initiatives.

data.title: Hilton Metal Forging Secures Key Approval for Vande Bharat Wheels, Boosting Growth Prospects
data.description: Hilton Metal Forging has received approval from RITES Ltd for Vande Bharat and LHB forged wheels, enhancing its product portfolio and market position.

data.title: Tata Motors Seeks New Magnet Supply Sources Amid Supply Chain Challenges
data.description: Tata Motors is exploring alternative sources for magnet supply, aiming to enhance production efficiency amid supply chain challenges.
